channel.title: "requesting titel screen"?
channel.description:
Oke so i made a client webclient ready, and works fine! it downloads cache and starting up just fine!
but then after jarring and signing the client and putting it up on a webhost, it says "requesting titel screen retrying in 5 seconds"
i jarred and signed like 100 times other clients and they worked fine.
this one i jarred and signed like 50 times, then i followed that tut step by step how i learned it and still the same "requesting titel screen"
anyone knows why this strange error comes up?

item.title: "requesting titel screen"?
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

Tutorial:

Make sure the directories are correct and that every single file that the client loads from the cache is in the right spot. I’ve had this problem once before, but I quickly fixed it by finding a directory that I missed/forgot to change.

as i said, it works fine loading data from the C: drive, when i run it just with batch files, but after jarring it, it doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: "requesting titel screen"?
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

202685:

try deleting your cache, jarring it and uploading it,then letting the webclient download the cache

i did, still the same requesting shit :s
